column4: hi, i'm using mail-notification 2.0 in edgy and i can't use the "mail-reader" feature because it tries to open evolution (although i don't have it installed). any ideas how to change that to thunderbird? (btw in my preferred apps there's of course thunderbird for email)
nope, i know that this is for ubuntu and not xubuntu, but in the xubuntu irc there was no one who could help me. in xubuntu thunderbird is standard mail app.
is evolution maybe hardcoded in mail-notification?
